Summary: seemingly square object, then lit up with two red lights
divs: Sighting Detailsok, I'll make this brief because I dont know if you'll contact me. I had experiences since I was about 4 or 5. It got to the point where I was paralyzed in my bed at about age 7. At 9 or 10 I actually saw a UFO from my bedroon window. My experiences were abductions for about 3 years. At least I really , really think they were and lately I've ordered a book from amazon referring to the men in black and my address was somehow changed so I never received the book.I believe in what you are doing and I just need to know you'll respond to me before I elaboorate, thank you, Kenneth
